Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: During operational search actions the officers of Maktaral Regional Department of Internal Affairs on the received operational information, on the route Saryagash-Zhetysay stopped the car of the Audi-100 brand and detained the passenger of this car, inhabitant of Maktaral region, 1995 year of birth, on suspicion in transportation of drugs by illicit way from Tajikistan. Without having found at a search of personal belongings and clothes of the suspect the narcotic substances, guards assumed that probably young girl transports drugs by other way. After carrying out necessary procedures experts took 10 polyethylene bags with narcotic substances from a rectum of the detainee. Gross weight of the withdrawn drugs made, according to the judicial and criminalistic examination, over 40 grams of "heroin" and about 13 grams of "opium". During preliminary investigation, police officers found out that the suspect in spite of the fact that she is pregnant, repeatedly thus transported drugs from Tajikistan to the Republic of Kazakhstan, for a certain acquaintance from Aktau, Mangistau oblast, with whom she got acquainted in social networks and who promised her 50 thousand tenge for delivery of each smuggling in Aktau. On this fact criminal case under two articles 250 of the Criminal Code RK "Smuggling of the subjects withdrawn from usage or the subjects, usage of which is limited" and 259 of the Criminal Code RK "Illegal Production, Processing, Acquisition, Storage, Transportation, Transfer or Sale of Drugs or Psychotropic Substances" are brought. The suspect is arrested. The investigation is carried.
